text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-RoleClass where concept is-a MNT

name: RoleClassMaintainedEntity
title: RoleClassMaintainedEntity
description: An entity (player) that is maintained by another entity (scoper). This is typical role held by durable equipment. The scoper assumes responsibility for proper operation, quality, and safety.
